title: 3D Electron Diffraction Data: Na2-ADC Structure Determination
description: Complete 3D electron diffraction dataset collected using continuous rotation electron diffraction (cRED) for structure determination of sodium acetylenedicarboxylate (Na2-ADC). This dataset includes raw diffraction frames, processed data, and structure solution files suitable for crystallographic analysis and method development.
notes: Dataset collected as part of electron diffraction method development. All data processed using standard crystallographic software. Structure deposited in Cambridge Structural Database (CSD). Raw data suitable for method comparison and software development.

creators.name: Smith, John A.
creators.affiliation: University of Southampton, National Crystallography Service

creators.name: Jones, Sarah B.
creators.affiliation: University of Southampton, School of Chemistry

creators.name: Wilson, Michael C.
creators.affiliation: Diamond Light Source, Electron Bio-Imaging Centre

grants.funder: Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council
grants.award_title: Advanced Electron Crystallography for Structure Determination

parameters.Detector: Rigaku HyPix-ED, hybrid pixel array detector
parameters.Name: Na2-ADC
parameters.Grid: lacey carbon coated copper grid, 200 mesh (Agar Scientific)
parameters.Sample preparation: Sample ground between glass slides, grid dabbed, cryo transfer @ 175 K
